thread.section_title: Pack Mule Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pack Mule | packmule.com
thread.title: Tom Rice
thread.title_full: Pack Mule reviewed by Tom Rice

author: Tom Rice
title: Tom Rice
text: In an effort to replace my tired, old utility cart with a high speed, low drag- heavy duty cart, my research led me to Packmule, where I began a dialogue with Andrew Prosser. Andrew provided excellent, and timely customer service including graciously accommodating my last minute "add ons. In the end, I was not able to actually purchase the cart; but Andrew and the Packmule design team were exceptional in designing a powerhouse, which would have easily met my demanding needs. The proposal was sent out expediently, and I have no complaints. Thanks guys!
